llm.feedback: The draft is too verbose, exceeds the 4–6‑sentence limit, and only loosely ties claims to canonical handles (UST10Y, SPX, DXY). Remove all explanatory prose beyond the core view and collapse the analysis into 5 concise bullets, each with an inline (HHKTQ3JYH) citation. Explicitly state the sign/magnitude for each handle (e.g., UST10Y + 50–100 bp, SPX – 1–2 %) and the causal chain: Fed hikes → higher real rates → lower consumer spending & merchant capital → ↓ transaction volume → margin compression → equity price decline. Include a catalyst window (Q4 2025 Fed statement, FTC/CFPB filings, crypto‑wallet volume trends) and watch items (Fed meetings, regulatory filings, wallet‑to‑wallet metrics). End with a confidence rating (“moderate”) and a 15–20 % upside range if conditions hold. This will satisfy the SECTION FOCUS constraints and the canonical‑handle mapping requirement.
